TopicTitle: Any other KSP nerds at RSA?

Articles.Content:
This is probably the wrong forum, but I wasn't sure.

I'm at the RSA convention in San Fransisco.... and bored out of my mind. Tomorrow I will be manning a desk off and on. Ill be at desk #600 for the American Bar Association. Drop by and ask for Richard and I'll give you a free membership. You don't need to be a lawyer. Or come to my panel discussion in West-2007 at 4:40 tomorrow afternoon.

RSA convention? Entire convention is encrypted with RSA? What is the public key? And how people look when encrypted? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

![BusKcShIYAEPWHr.png](https://pbs.twimg.com/media/BusKcShIYAEPWHr.png)

Just kidding ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

On serious note, what is RSA? You mentioned lawyers, but since 50% of US citizens are lawyers ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif), it does not help much.

> 
> RSA convention? Entire convention is encrypted with RSA? What is the public key? And how people look when encrypted? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
> [https://pbs.twimg.com/media/BusKcShIYAEPWHr.png](https://pbs.twimg.com/media/BusKcShIYAEPWHr.png)
> 
> Just kidding ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
> 
> On serious note, what is RSA? You mentioned lawyers, but since 50% of US citizens are lawyers ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif), it does not help much.

[http://www.rsaconference.com/events/us15](http://www.rsaconference.com/events/us15)

Moved to the off-topic lounge. 

Hope you're less bored tomorrow, Sandworm. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
